name: Scrapheap
description:
Scrapheap is a side-scrolling space shooter in which your ship is constantly breaking down. You must weave through enemies using your guns and missiles to protect yourself. You also control a repair robot inside the ship to fix parts as they break and stop the ship going OUT OF CONTROL! Survive for as long as you can.

Instructions

Space Controls:

Arrow Keys: Vertical Movement

Shoot: Space

Missiles: 'C'

Robot Controls:

WASD: Movement
